item.title: Enlitic
item.description:
http://www.economist.com/news/science-and-technology/21713828-silicon-valley-has-squidgy-worlds-biology-and-disease-its-sights-will

  • It is obvious that pattern matching and data science will eventuall lead to better medicine.
  • Medical care should become great due to data driven decisions.
  • Enlitic is a startup in this space

item.title: Corporate Tax in the US
item.description:
https://theintercept.com/2017/01/05/corporations-prepare-to-gorge-on-tax-cuts-trump-claims-will-create-jobs/

  • US companies have a trillions of dollars in offshore money as the corporate tax rate is 35%.
  • Trump is proposing reducing the tax rate to 15%
  • If this will happen companies will just use this to do more M&A and not for job creation.
